 Wish I could help koakasper, had no problems with installing it, just followed instructions and it worked, no mention of serial number at all, sorry.

koakasper that's an easy one!

Run setup.reg!

Then click Yes. Or OK, whatever it says.

Cracked. =]

64 bit sytems can not import registry settings as normal,

do some research to learn how, there's a page on microsofts website which will teach you how.
cheers.
Can you give a link to that site on Microsoft? cuz i can't get it to work at all.... :'(

can not confirm the link as it came from someone else, but here it is.

http://support.microsoft.com/kb/896459

also, if you open the setup.reg with notepad, you can view the settings and keys which need to be entered.
good luck, 
and cheers.
